category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, promotes diuresis, resolves swelling and removes toxicity

indications: Dysentery, jaundice due to Damp-Heat, traumatic injury, sores, abscesses and boils, hematuria, sore throat, rubella, pinkeye, scabies, epistaxis, urolithiasis, diarrhea due to Summerheat, abdominal pain due to eruptive disease

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, reduces swelling and stops pain
Cools the Blood and stops bleeding

indications: Bleeding due to Heat in the Blood, hematemesis, hemoptysis

action.primary: Clears the Liver and brightens the eyes

indications: Night blindness in children, eye inflammation, cataracts, glaucoma

contraindications: Contraindicated for for those with Deficiency Cold.

useCases: Sores and abscesses due to Blazing Heat Toxin.

notes: This herb is said to treat skin eruptions and urinary tract infections.
One source says it activates the Blood and acts as a sedative.

One source says that this herb treats tidal fevers at midnight and noon, dizziness, aversion to Cold, aching in the limbs and trunk with an encumbered sensation, lack of taste for food and drink, progressive sores, continuous fever due to consumption,
To facilitate urination, it should be taken with water buffalo meat.
